WorkshopItemInfo.Name: Scale Up
WorkshopItemInfo.Description:
Increases output of later modules to match their costs. This results in less need to spread out, and building up your colonies becoming more viable:
I didn't like how the output of some tier2/3 buildings scaled compared to their predecessors: I weighted the costs of the consumed resources as the selling cost and assumed a value of 4.5 for volatiles and water. I further assumed that each higher tier should improve efficency by 25%.
Calculations done here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kbdrbn9GRRSzWrncp68BoGihnSmEwzVs-3IEFvHB610
Resulting in the following changes:
Research Universities: 200->420
Fission Reactor: 42->46 Fission Reactor Farm: 125->180
Fusion Array: 85->100 Fusion Farm: 250->360 Heavy Fusion Farm: 450->1100 !
Atomsmasher 0.01 -> 0.023 (only module that got adjusted in the base tier)
Removed MC costs from all but the colony main building(e.g. Mining installation and research universities).
Increased the mining output modifier to be on par with alien mining buildings: Settlement Mining: 1.5 -> 2 Colony Mining: 2->4
Increased MC generation of: Operations Center: 1->2 Control Center: 2->4
For more ways to upscale production you can checkout [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2887840263]More Tech[/url]
